H0.text: Pollution is defined as the act of contaminating the environment with waste.

H2.text: Climate change is defined as the act of contaminating the environment with waste.

H3.text: Global warming is defined as the act of contaminating the environment with waste.

A4.text: Pollution is the introduction of contaminants into the natural environment that cause harm.
